net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.dnd

Interface Transferable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ListElementTransferable, ResourceTransferable, SimpleEntityTransferable, SimpleTransferable, StringTransferable

    public interface Transferable
    Interface defining data that can be transfered between two objects. The data should not change over the life time of a Transferable instance. The instance is only used during the processing of a drag and drop operation and therefore has a short life time and there will not be many instances.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<ContentType> getTransferContentTypes()
      Get the supported content types for this data.
      Object getTransferData(ContentType contentType)
      Get the transfer data in the given content type.

    • Method Detail

      • getTransferContentTypes

        Collection<ContentType> getTransferContentTypes()
        Get the supported content types for this data.
        Returns:
        Collection of ContentType.

      • getTransferData

        Object getTransferData(ContentType contentType)
                       throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Get the transfer data in the given content type. The content type should be checked against getTransferContentTypes() before calling this method.
        Parameters:
        contentType - the content type.
        Returns:
        Object.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the content type is not supported, which should not happen if the content type is in the collection returned by getTransferContentTypes().
